text.div:
Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    49721-4 Haemophilus influenzae type [Identifier] in Isolate
    58739-4 Haemophilus influenzae serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    69410-9 Haemophilus influenzae [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    85778-9 Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture

name: Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae by Culture and Identification Method)
